name: ğŸš€ Build and Deploy to Dokploy

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch:

env:
  REGISTRY: docker.io
  WEB_IMAGE: rugolop/vigila-web
  BACKEND_IMAGE: rugolop/vigila-backend

jobs:
  build-and-push:
    name: ğŸ”¨ Build & Push Images
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: ğŸ”‘ Login to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

      - name: ğŸ—ï¸ Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: ğŸ³ Build and push Backend
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
        with:
          context: apps/backend
          file: apps/backend/Dockerfile.prod
          platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64
          push: true
          tags: |
            ${{ env.BACKEND_IMAGE }}:latest
            ${{ env.BACKEND_IMAGE }}:${{ github.sha }}
          cache-from: type=registry,ref=${{ env.BACKEND_IMAGE }}:buildcache
          cache-to: type=registry,ref=${{ env.BACKEND_IMAGE }}:buildcache,mode=max

      - name: ğŸŒ Build and push Web
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
        with:
          context: .
          file: apps/web/Dockerfile
          platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64
          push: true
          tags: |
            ${{ env.WEB_IMAGE }}:latest
            ${{ env.WEB_IMAGE }}:${{ github.sha }}
          build-args: |
            NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://api.vigila.itcore.es
            BETTER_AUTH_URL=https://vigila.itcore.es
            NEXT_PUBLIC_BETTER_AUTH_URL=https://vigila.itcore.es
          cache-from: type=registry,ref=${{ env.WEB_IMAGE }}:buildcache
          cache-to: type=registry,ref=${{ env.WEB_IMAGE }}:buildcache,mode=max

  deploy:
    name: ğŸš¢ Deploy to Dokploy
    needs: build-and-push
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: ğŸ”„ Update services via SSH
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v1.0.3
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.DOKPLOY_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.DOKPLOY_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.DOKPLOY_SSH_KEY }}
          port: 22
          script: |
            echo "ğŸ”„ Actualizando servicio backend..."
            docker service update --image ${{ env.BACKEND_IMAGE }}:latest vigila_backend --force
            
            echo "ğŸ”„ Actualizando servicio web..."
            docker service update --image ${{ env.WEB_IMAGE }}:latest vigila_web --force
            
            echo "âœ… Despliegue completado!"

      - name: âœ… Deployment Success
        run: |
          echo "ğŸ‰ Despliegue exitoso!"
          echo "Backend: ${{ env.BACKEND_IMAGE }}:${{ github.sha }}"
          echo "Web: ${{ env.WEB_IMAGE }}:${{ github.sha }}"
